name: EctoHunter
description:
Doom meets Pacman in this first-person style action-adventure, created for Miz Jam with the restriction of using only the given 2D tile map.

Made in way less than 48h over the course of 9 days with Unity 2019.4 and Game Creator by gypynkt (Sebastian Graetz), with original music by Tunglith. This was the first time trying myself out on a first-person game, and also the first time using a 2D asset kit for a 3D game. There is still a lot of polish missing that I hopefully will get to during the next few weeks.

WASD to move, E to place and drink flasks, Q to mutate into a ghost after drinking enough flasks, ESC to pause menu.
